post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
My Interpretation
Current Stage ============ - Technical Info sharing - Friendly association - no more new members joining in - running out of seminar topics - not bad still very good
Different Options =============== - Stay as we are : not bad and comfortable - Convert to revenue generation group getting external project as a group or create own projects and sell - Community volunteer works Korean Society : there are others mainstream : different experience
Transform to become volunteer group ================================== - more spouses and children participation - satisfying experience specially for children - more involvement into mainstream
Transform to become project based group ====================================== Pros - good experience : find out what we are made of - good stepping stone for next ... - could be extra income - excitement
Cons - initial investment : time and money - who's going to be the leaders - we could lose what we have currently totally
Questions ========= - Are we ready to transform ? - if not, what should we do ? - Do you like where things are ? - Are we on up or down path ? - Do we need new young blood in the system ?
post.title: Future of Comm One
